musthead.title: The fair blockchain bank
musthead.desc: Take part in the open testing of cryptocurrency transfers by phone number and earn additional ZAM tokens

features.title: Why does the world need blockchain banks?
features.desc: Zamzam mission is to speed up the process of the transition from a traditional monetary system to a fully digital economy in order for banks and financial institutions all over the world to become open, fair and efficient through the implementation of blockchain and decentralized systems.

openness.title: Openness
openness.desc: Transparency of all operations in blockchain. Real-time publication of the Zamzam bank’s detailed financial activities. Open results of bank audit. You have never worked with such an open banking system!

fairness.title: Fairness
fairness.desc: Provide users with a choice between centralized and decentralized assets storage. Future is for hybrid systems, which give freedom of choice.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.desc: Reduce costs by circumventing the chain of intermediaries and abandoning obsolete methods of managing financial organizations.

wallet.name: zam wallet
wallet.title: Cryptocurrency wallet, as it should be
wallet.desc: Stop wasting your attention on dozens of financial applications with severely limited functionalities. The zam.wallet erases the boundaries between traditional money and cryptocurrencies while remaining more efficient than the market by 2-3 times.

merchant.name: Zam Merchant
merchant.title: Effortless financial management for your business!
merchant.desc: Doing business has never been so easy, intuitive & automated. While developing the zam.merchant, we took into account the needs of thousands of businessmеn from all over the world.

chain.name: Zam Chain
chain.title: Fast financial blockchain based on Stellar fork
chain.desc: Doing business has never been so easy, intuitive & automated. While developing the zam.merchant, we took into account the needs of thousands of businessmеn from all over the world.

table.title: Pricing
data: Transfers of cryptocurrency by phone number
Purchase of cryptocurrency with Visa, MasterCard, UnionPay cards
Ability to bind 1 bank card for withdrawal
Free SMS notifications of transactions per month
Limit per month for withdrawal to the card

alpha.title: Test zam wallet and get 1000 ZAM as a gift for premium payment
